content.raw:
I'd like to point out that there is no "scene widget" on Ignition GUI yet. 

I believe you're referring to the `TopicInterface` plugin and the underlying `MessageWidget`, which is meant to be a flexible general purpose widget that can be used to introspect any kind of message, including scene messages. It is flexible enough to be embedded into other widgets if desired.

I agree that a "panels" widget as you mentioned would be a nice widget to have, but I don't think the existing nested widget should "not be used". Instead, it would be interesting to offer two types of views (generated from protobuf messages or not), both the "nested tree" and the "panels", which can be combined in different ways according to the use case and desired interaction. It would be convenient if they could share the underlying `PropertyWidget`s.

And by all means, we should have other views too. It all depends on the specific use case we're talking about - what data the widget is displaying and what the user wants to do with it - I'm sure there will be several different combinations.
